definition: Zichang county in Yan'an 延安[Yan2 an1], Shaanxi
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
chief/head/elder/to grow/to develop/to increase/to enhance
length/long/forever/always/constantly
Zichang county in Yan'an 延安[Yan2 an1], Shaanxi

sentences.english: He was found to have brain tumors, and they were growing fast.
sentences.chinese: 他的腦袋長瘤，瘤子長得很快。

sentences.english: Do we need to know all about the Octomom’s new house?
sentences.chinese: 我們有必要知道八胞胎母親的新房子長什麼樣嗎？

sentences.english: For this purpose, they tore up the pavement for the length of several houses more.
sentences.chinese: 爲此又挖了幾間屋子長的展路石。

sentences.english: Zichang oilfield is located in the eastern slope of Ordos basin.
sentences.chinese: 子長油田位於鄂爾多斯盆地東部斜坡。

sentences.english: All the curtains were the same size-twenty-eight cubits long and four cubits wide.
sentences.chinese: 每幅幔子長二十八寸，寬四寸，都是一樣的尺寸。

sentences.english: The twins are so much alike that we can hardly tell them apart.
sentences.chinese: 這對雙生子長得非常相像，我們幾乎辯認不出他們。

sentences.english: The plums grown so well, he eats some of the plums.
sentences.chinese: 看到梅子長得正好，就採了一些喫起來。

sentences.english: Simplified vigour index was proved to be the total length of seedlings germinated by 100 seeds.
sentences.chinese: 簡化活力指數實質上只是百粒種子長出幼苗的總長度。

sentences.english: I still stand by my opinion that my girl should be in the bathroom longer than me.
sentences.chinese: 我始終認爲，女孩子使用浴室的時間應該比男孩子長。
